mapper.select: SELECT c_business_renting_house.id as id, (select concat('{"id":"', cbfsi.id, '","pid":"', cbfsi.pid, '","title":"', cbfsi.title, '"}') from c_business_front_select_item cbfsi where (cbfsi.id = c_business_renting_house.classification)) AS classification, c_business_renting_house.deleted as deleted, c_business_renting_house.floor_layer as floor_layer, c_business_renting_house.comment_num as comment_num, c_business_renting_house.details as details, c_business_renting_house.description as description, c_business_renting_house.decoration as decoration, c_business_renting_house.updated_at as updated_at, ( SELECT concat( '{"id":"', sbu.id, '","user_name":"', sbu.user_name, '","phone":"', IFNULL(sbu.phone, ''), '"}' ) FROM s_base_user sbu WHERE (sbu.id = c_business_renting_house.user_id) ) AS user_id, c_business_renting_house.back_check_time as back_check_time, c_business_renting_house.title as title, c_business_renting_house.genre as genre, c_business_renting_house.updated_by as updated_by, c_business_renting_house.house_type as house_type, c_business_renting_house.not_pass_reason as not_pass_reason, c_business_renting_house.cover as cover, c_business_renting_house.community as community, c_business_renting_house.area as area, (select concat('{"id":"', sbsi.id, '","pid":"', sbsi.pid, '","title":"', sbsi.title, '"}') from s_base_select_item sbsi where (sbsi.id = c_business_renting_house.back_check_status)) AS back_check_status, c_business_renting_house.price as price, (select concat('{"id":"', cbfsi.id, '","pid":"', cbfsi.pid, '","title":"', cbfsi.title, '"}') from c_business_front_select_item cbfsi where (cbfsi.id = c_business_renting_house.matching)) AS matching, c_business_renting_house.created_by as created_by, c_business_renting_house.oriented as oriented, c_business_renting_house.star as star, c_business_renting_house.created_at as created_at from c_business_renting_house where c_business_renting_house.id = #{rentingHouseId} and c_business_renting_house.deleted = false
